hero.title: Calm weekly coordination for parish life
hero.description: Parish management app built for modern parish life. Paxora helps clergy, staff, and volunteers align on This Week, service tasks, events, and requests without admin overload.

featuresPage.title: Everything your parish needs each week
featuresPage.description: These modules work together so your team can serve people, not chase logistics.

pricing.title: Pilot pricing
pricing.pilotBanner: Currently in pilot: onboarding a limited number of partner parishes.

pilot.title: Pilot Partner
pilot.description: Guided onboarding, feedback loop, and priority support during pilot.

pro.title: Future Pro Tier
pro.description: Planned for post-pilot with expanded administration and support options.

about.title: About Paxora Parish Center App
about.mission: We build a parish management app that restores shared responsibility and calm rhythm in parish life.
about.story: Paxora started from real parish coordination pain: too many WhatsApp threads, spreadsheets, and last-minute calls. We are building practical tools for Ukrainian and English-speaking parish communities.

demo.title: Book a guided demo
demo.description: See how This Week, tasks, requests, and communication come together for your leadership team.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: Tell us about your parish and we will reach out to plan pilot onboarding.

footer.copy: ¬© Paxora Parish Center App. Pilot program in progress.
